game.name: Michael Test
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Michael Test는 고전 회화 속 감춰진 진실을 드러내고, 소리의 흔적을 찾고 들으며 추리를 통해 ‘죄’를 선택하는 포인트 앤 클릭 어드벤처 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Michael Test is a point-and-click adventure game where you uncover hidden truths within classical paintings and follow faint traces of sound to deduce and choose the final ‘sin.’
